pizzas.name: Margherita
pizzas.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

pizzas.name: Pepperoni
pizzas.description: A timeless favorite featuring pepperoni slices and melted cheese.

pizzas.name: Vegetarian
pizzas.description: Loaded with a variety of fresh vegetables for a delightful veggie experience.

pizzas.name: BBQ Chicken
pizzas.description: Tender chicken, red onions, and barbecue sauce for a tangy and savory flavor.

pizzas.name: Hawaiian
pizzas.description: A tropical delight with ham, pineapple, and a blend of cheeses.

pizzas.name: Supreme
pizzas.description: An all-in-one pizza experience with a variety of meats and vegetables.

pizzas.name: Mushroom and Truffle
pizzas.description: A luxurious blend of mushrooms, truffle oil, and premium cheeses.

pizzas.name: Buffalo Chicken
pizzas.description: Spicy buffalo chicken, blue cheese, and ranch dressing for a kick of flavor.

pizzas.name: Four Cheese
pizzas.description: A cheese lover's dream with a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, feta, and parmesan.

pizzas.name: Pesto Delight
pizzas.description: Fresh pesto, cherry tomatoes, and pine nuts for a vibrant and flavorful pizza.
